metadata.title: Loot Weapon Start (Multiverse)
metadata.author: Codex
metadata.description: Adds a start-of-run loot weapon selector via the Boon Selector menu. - Requires FTL Multiverse + Hyperspace - Patch after Multiverse; compatible with Judge Boon Selector - Edit data/events_special_main.xml.append to set weapon IDs and number of choices
